entities.name: xenophilius lovegood
entities.description: Xenophilius Lovegood is mentioned as the one who opens the door, described as barefoot and wearing a stained nightshirt. He is also compared to how he looked at Bill and Fleur's wedding.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned in the context of Xenophilius Lovegood's appearance, indicating that Xenophilius was more dapper at Bill's wedding compared to his current state.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned in the context of Xenophilius Lovegood's appearance, indicating that Xenophilius was more dapper at Bill and Fleur's wedding compared to his current state.

entities.name: mr. lovegood
entities.description: Mr. Lovegood is mentioned as the one who wants to help, indicating that he is Xenophilius Lovegood's title or name used by others.
